name: BUTA! (demo)
description:
BUTA! is a relaxing adventure type side-scrolling 2D puzzle-platformer that teaches players about the traditional foods in different countries.

When Momo the pig receives a mysterious parcel in the mail, it turns out to be a cookbook with recipes for different foods from all around the world, and thus she embarks on a journey to all the different cities where the recipes originated from to learn how to make these foods.

Features:

  • Hand-drawn art and animations
  • 9 levels
  • Combination of cooking game and platformer
  • relaxing and easy to play

As BUTA! is a student project made under time constraints, it is still under construction so the current version may have some minor bugs. Some levels may also be lacking instructions and GUI. Any comments and suggestions would be appreciated!
